blocks.content:
## Our Work 

3 Ways to Heck creates cybersecurity material to educate the general public about the online vulnerabilities around them. From easy to understand articles to competitions, 3 Ways to Heck adopts a wide variety of mediums to cater to as many audiences as possible. In addition, 3 Ways to Heck works with the Bay Area Community College Consortium to educate students on careers in cybersecurity and computer science.

hero.headline: Welcome to 3 Ways to Heck!
hero.textline: Educating the public about major issues in cybersecurity.
